item.title: The Integration and Interaction of Multiple Mathematical Reasoning Processes.
item.description: Platform Grant Investigators # Andrew Ireland (Heriot-Watt University) [ Principal Investigator ] David Aspinall (University of Edinburgh) Alan Bundy (University of Edinburgh) Alan Smaill (University of Edinburgh) Jacques Fleuriot (University of Edinburgh) Paul Jackson (University of Edinburgh) Fiona McNeill (Heriot-Watt University) Greg Michaelson (Heriot-Watt University) Jeremy Gow (Goldsmiths College) Gudmund Grov (Heriot-Watt University) Simon Colton (Goldsmiths College) Overview # This Platform Grant supports essential infrastructure and exploratory activities for a portfolio of projects that focus on the automation of mathematical reasoning processes - including their analysis, development and interaction.
